ELEMENTARY.name: fish
ELEMENTARY.hint: animal that lives in water and has gills for breathing

ELEMENTARY.name: bird
ELEMENTARY.hint: animal that has feathers and wings

MEDIUM.name: tortoise
MEDIUM.hint: carries its house on the back

ADVANCED.name: mammal
ADVANCED.hint: warm-blooded creature that gives birth to live young and feeds them milk

ADVANCED.name: predator
ADVANCED.hint: animal that hunts and eats other animals

ELEMENTARY.name: circus
ELEMENTARY.hint: performance with clowns and other entertainers, typically held in a large tent

MEDIUM.name: carousel
MEDIUM.hint: rotating amusement ride with seats that are usually decorated as animals

MEDIUM.name: attraction
MEDIUM.hint: entertainment feature at a fair, amusement park, or other public place

ADVANCED.name: exhibition
ADVANCED.hint: public display of works of art, products, or other items

ADVANCED.name: rollerblading
ADVANCED.hint: sport activity in which a person wears inline skates and glides along on wheels
